budgetFlightsCountMessage: {count, plural, =0 {There are no budget flights set up} =1 {There is a budget flight set up} other {There are # budget flights set up}}
autoBudgetReallocErrNoMonetary: Use monetary budget type to activate
autoBudgetReallocErrNoGoal: Set a target KPI to activate
autoBudgetReallocErrNoParentBudgetAndUnl: Unlock the budget or enable parent budget to activate
autoBudgetReallocErrNoActiveOrFutureBudg: Create or extend budget flights to activate
